name: Granagrams
description:
Granagrams (PC Game) Name Entry

Players enter their name using an interactive on-screen keyboard.  In-game fonts are interchangeable.

Main Game

Collects letters to make words in the category list to proceed through levels.  Good for hand to eye coordination and assists in several forms of acuity.

Progression

100 different subjects are presented to the player throughout the game.  As a category is complete a star is awarded.  The game consists of 500+ levels and 13,000+ words; with expansion packs, customisability and add-ons planned for the future
